AUTH_ID = #sParaId#

SELECT A.* ,fn_ct_get_code_name('system_type', A.SYSTEM_TYPE ) AS SYSTEM_TYPE_VIEW FROM TB_CM_MT_PARAMETER A WHERE 1=1 AND PARAM_ID = #param_id#
